description:
Taking this intermediate course for Microsoft Excel will explain the processes of how to accomplish some common tasks you need in Excel. If you are anything like most people who use their computers for work, it is much easier to have an example and the explanation on how to do something, than to try and figure it out yourself.

The Microsoft Excel 2010 Level 2 will strengthen the skills that you have already, while also giving you some new techniques for Excel. The tasks that you will learn are:

• To organize your worksheet and table data using various options
• Create and modify charts
• Customize workbooks and enhance your Microsoft Office Excel environment
• Modify graphic objects in a worksheet, analyze data using Pivot Tables, slicers and Pivot Charts

Consider this Microsoft Excel 2010 Level 2 to improve your Microsoft Excel 2010 skills.

Our Microsoft courses help you to prepare for the official Microsoft Office Specialist exam.
title: Microsoft Excel 2010 Intermediate
instructors: SONIC - High Quality Training for Over 20 Years
